revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From New {{m+|la|Xanthochroi}} (from {{m|grc|ξανθός||fair", "yellow", "golden", "blond}} + {{m|grc|χρώς||skin}}) + {{m|en|-ic}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|en|/zænθəˈkɹəʊɪk/}} ===Adjective=== {{en-adj}} # pertaining to people or races with light hair and pale complexions
